text:
@[redacted_name] @[redacted_name] @[redacted_name] @[redacted_name]
同學，之前由[redacted_name]幫你們代墊交給屋主的押金（相等於你們一個月的租金數目），需要你們安排在11月8號之前交還給[redacted_name]
如果你們有paynow的功能，你可以直接paynow給我
手機號碼：[redacted_number]
trans:
@[redacted_name] @[redacted_name] @[redacted_name] @[redacted_name]
Dear students, previously [redacted_name] helped you pay the deposit (equivalent to one month's rent) to the landlord on your behalf. You need to arrange for the repayment to [redacted_name] before November 8.
If you have PayNow, you can directly pay me.
Mobile number: [redacted_number]
